name: SIMON (a lord of the flies game)
name_original: SIMON (a lord of the flies game)
description:
You play as simon from lord of the flies. Complete quests for your friends as thing start to go slowly wrong after your first hunt with jack...

Programming/story: Jadyn Lewis

Art:  Andy

Controls: Arrow keys to move, Z to close text, X for next page, bump into characters to talk to them.
